Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation immediately preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that occur in cases eventually leading to Manuscript Export Succeeded for production
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation compared to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurring within 7 days of First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' occurs

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in comparison to First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants that contain both First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Percentage of cases with First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that successfully reach Manuscript Export Succeeded without further interventions
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of variants that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation after a revision cycle (e.g., following RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to the total number of submission-related activities (including Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation, Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation, and Resubmission Manuscript Submission Confirmation)
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that originate from a major or minor revision decision (e.g., after SW-EIC Major Revision or RW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that appear in the final phase of the process (i.e., after an EIC accept decision)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation per month to assess temporal distribution in the review lifecycle
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities
